mapper.select: SELECT common_detail_code AS "code", common_detail_name AS "name" FROM common_detail WHERE SUBSTR(common_detail_code,1,4) IN('RSFC') AND common_detail_status ='Y'

SELECT i.history_no, i.prev_count, i.new_count, c.common_detail_name AS change_reason, i.reason_detail, i.mod_user, TO_CHAR(i.mod_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS mod_date, i.diff_count FROM inventory_history i LEFT JOIN common_detail c ON i.change_reason = c.common_detail_code WHERE i.inventory_no = #{inventory_no} ORDER BY i.history_no DESC
